Text: Thanks a lot, man! Too bad they didn't show the ladies' and the first of the men's quarter-finals... But that's the way Eurosport always is. :(
The Oslo sprint events on 14th March 2010 are 1 hour 25 minutes long so they might cover a few more heats.
Posting torrents to Piratebay is currently down so either use the magnet link or get the torrent from Demonoid.
